instructions: Go to your smartphone's App Store and search for and download Nintendo Switch Parental Controls. The Nintendo Switch Parental Controls app is available for both iOS and Android-based smartphones. Launch the app. Tap Next . Sign into your Nintendo Account by entering your account details. Tap Next . Tap Select This Person under the profile of the account you want to use. On your Nintendo Switch, go back to the Parental Controls screen and select If You've Already Downloaded the App . On the Switch, enter the six-digit registration code shown on the Parental Controls app on your smartphone. Select Link . Congrats! You've successfully linked your Switch to the Nintendo Switch Parental Controls app.
